article:
It's September1st, and we're all back to school. It's good to _ all my teachers and friends again. They all _ fine.
We're in Grade Eight this year. We have some new subjects. I'm not very _ at Chinese, but Han Mei says she can _ me. I think I can _ it better.
I like English very much. Zhang Hong likes English, _ . But she needs help. I think I can help her.
Mr Hu is our new English teacher. He _ know all of us, so he has our names on a piece of paper and _ our names before he begins his lesson.
